website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and reliable at a great price for workers who do not need a steel toe for protection.
pros: Comfortable fit right out of the box
Great for yard work and everyday wear
cons: They do not have a protective toe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wear the shoes all day the first time I wore them. It was as if they had been worn for weeks. I previously had this same shoe with safety toes. I wore that pair for over two years of hard use. I'm looking forward to the same service from this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot but the insole was a little lite and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot but the insole was a little lite and allowed a lot of cold through when temps got below freezing. Added a Dr Scholl's under the insole and they are super comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Finding the rite Boot
customer_reviews.text: Any1 that work, & live in there boots know how hard it is to find a boot that will stay together, not be to heavy & not move in the toe area,, And sum of these prices out there will blow your socks off. I've had many over the last 51yrs, and seen the faults in many, and have been disappointed many times... Its Been 2weeks so far and they Are Handling the chemicals ,and oil at work, and its spring so the outside jobs, and wetness seem to be good aswell. I'm in my boots about 16hours a day & have heel spurs, I usually wear 8inch, but luv'n these 6inch....
customer_reviews.author: Brian Canfield

customer_reviews.title: He has a woodshop in our garage that he spends a great deal of time in during the weekends and his ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for hubby as a Christmas present. He has a woodshop in our garage that he spends a great deal of time in during the weekends and his old work shoes were falling apart, literally. He needed something comfortable and sturdy, and these met both of the criteria. They seem to run a little large, but I also purchased the Carhartt socks (which he loves!) and that seemed to alleviate the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Momahawk

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, took it out in not the fields and didnt have any issue. Only issue I had was one of the sewing seams didnt go into the tongue correctly so it was poking into my ankle. Ended up having to loosen it up a little bit to make it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S

customer_reviews.title: My go to pair of work boots when working in the yard
customer_reviews.text: My go to pair of work boots when working in the yard. They are lightweight and waterproof. I have a pond and am constantly working in the mud/muck and these boots have kept my feet dry every time. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kdowd771

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh......
customer_reviews.text: These shoes definitely did not feel good for me. I came from timberland pros and thought I would give these a try but they are very hard and harsh on my feet. I bought them towards the end of November and I am now forced to by another pair because the pain on my feet and kneed are becoming too much. Works for other but didn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I wear them daily for work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 3 pairs of these! I love them. I wear them daily for work! I buy a new pair and wear outside of work until the old ones get to beat up and then I buy another pair and switch them out!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellet workboots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my husband who works in construction and he found them to be very comfortable and supportive plus they run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shoe, only thing is I put a removable arc support in mine and they are great
customer_reviews.author: kpp

customer_reviews.title: High quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with these boots. Bought them for work around the house and occasional walks around town, and have been thrilled with the support and shock absorption. There's a layer of foam within the outsole that absorbs much of the shock when you walk, and if they're laced up tight they feel absolutely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucasdickson12

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boot
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth pair of Carhart boots I have bought. I wear them every day for work and they hold up great. I am a general contractor, and have not worn out a pair yet. the soles have not worn out and doing tile and flooring the toes hold up to the wear and tear. Will keep buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots so far been using them for a month still in good condition for heavy duty work
customer_reviews.author: Marian V.

customer_reviews.title: Stitching inside boot is not the best
customer_reviews.text: Comfort of the fit was amazing other than the heel stitching on the right boot. Worst blisters and pain I’ve ever experienced in a pair of boots. The stitch is overdone and gnarled inside the fabric and feels like a rock just jabbing away at my heel bone with every step.
customer_reviews.author: joel strzelecki

customer_reviews.title: Says that the best boots there are for working on the yard will ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them! Says that the best boots there are for working on the yard will continue to buy them. He's had a pair before lasted for years very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Mt son because he works outside. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Featherston

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a all around boot, light weight, durable and lives up to the carhartt name.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Siffert

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my husband for Christmas.. he has worn them maybe 6 or 7 times,still looks brand new other than the front outside sole have came apart.. I have ordered Carhartt boots for him before and had no problems.. my return date has expired so can't return them...
customer_reviews.author: amanda brock

customer_reviews.title: They are a good looking boot and seem to be well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them a few days, but they seem to be what I was looking for. They are a good looking boot and seem to be well constructed. I'm hoping I'll still feel the same a year from now when it's time to order a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: todpod58

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and fits great I use the wide width
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy,it's fits perfectly and has heal support that I need the most.. lightweight and very happy to have bought them..I'm in construction and always need a great boot..
customer_reviews.author: Joseph m.

customer_reviews.title: overall the boot is great and looks great
customer_reviews.text: overall the boot is great and looks great. I have flat feet so i had to put in my arch support. other than that great boot
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Sarkisian

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable work boot
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable - returning after trying for a week to "break them in"
customer_reviews.author: Doc Falconi

customer_reviews.title: Just breaking in but seems like a soild boot.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews because they do run a 1/2 size larger and might I add they also run slightly wider which was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good for lighter work load
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as beefy as I expected from Carhartt. It's good for lighter work load, lots of toe room.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Heublein

customer_reviews.title: Seal them up with a good boot oil before putting them to use.
customer_reviews.text: Well made work boot that I can wear all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Best boot I've worn in a long time. I wear Carhartt clothing and have always been happy with everything I've ever worn. Tried the boots this time and I'm very pleased with the comfort and price. Durable and not stiff right off the bat. Will purchase them again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: darla r france

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said they did not fit. He said the sole of the shoe was cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were bought for my husband. He loves them...very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel King

customer_reviews.title: will by thi product again
customer_reviews.text: shoe fits as expected, also light weight. good fit wii recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Glenn mcwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Carhartt boots are the ONLY boot my husband will wear. He is rough on shoes and these things last!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them...
customer_reviews.text: My husband prefers to wear these boots. He works outside all day long. They last about a year in all increments of weather.
customer_reviews.author: k. baker

customer_reviews.title: Got the same size the last time I ordered them ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the same size the last time I ordered them and for some reason this one's a little wider than the other
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they have good, sturdy leather so that's to be expected
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to break in, but they have good, sturdy leather so that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a pipefitter in north jersey, normally I go with timberland boots. But after a few weeks i destroy my timberland boots, these seem to be a more sturdy build. And also they are extremely comfortable, anyone in the trades knows that having comfortable boots is just as important as having a warm jacket. Only thing is these boots seem to run a little large, normally i wear a 11 boot but these boots i could of gotten a 10.5 and would be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: the boots fit perfect & arrive on my doorstep right on time
customer_reviews.text: Amazon ordering, the boots fit perfect & arrive on my doorstep right on time!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl House

customer_reviews.title: The boots are nice. But the leather is a little soft so ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots are nice . But the leather is a little soft so the boots easily get cut up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your search for boots has ended! Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I found these boots sooner! They fit perfect and their light weight. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH JOHN PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable boot. I've used them about one week now
customer_reviews.author: Danny Woods

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved loved these boots very comfy and very nice materials they hold up pretty good he is in construction and loves them...
customer_reviews.author: shaila rozier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect and look really good! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Conner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit Great. they are comfortable. and look as expected
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad boot but not as comfortable as my Georgia Boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stites

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them, they boots fit but they were too stiff for my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Wertheim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them he's in construction and raves about the slip resident sole
customer_reviews.author: Lori cornish

customer_reviews.title: so I went for a half size smaller than normal and they fit perfect. These boots are great especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of these boots so I knew they ran a little big, so I went for a half size smaller than normal and they fit perfect. These boots are great especially for the price. They are extremely comfortable and they were not a pain to break in like some boots. The only thing that I have found negative is the laces come untied.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Boots done right.
customer_reviews.text: A great boot. Everything is right about the boot. (Of course, _I_ ordered the wide (15W) and it was really wide. My mistake--I only needed the M.)
customer_reviews.author: Theodore C. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots except for one thing... the claim of waterproof is in error.
customer_reviews.author: Leland1234

customer_reviews.title: Carhartt Wins Again!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with these boots, and the price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: George of the Jungle

customer_reviews.title: so far so good Only have wore them for three
customer_reviews.text: so far so good Only have wore them for three days
customer_reviews.author: Jack Weber Jr.

customer_reviews.title: My husband has been wanting this shoes for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting this shoes for a while so we finally purchased them only to open the box to find the shoes Extremely scuffed!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of boots so far, just breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: R Farps

customer_reviews.title: As expected Chippewa boots exceed my hopes comfortable fit right out of the box no real braking
customer_reviews.text: As expected Chippewa boots exceed my hopes comfortable fit right out of the box no real braking. Great shoe. The thing that amazes me is with such a high-quality shoe they still cannot put together a set of shoe laces that last beyond 3 days without beginning to fall apart. Although this is a very small price to pay for such a great boot at a great price. I had been a die-hard red wing fan for most of my adult life however the pricing climb in recent years had me look elsewhere. Chippewa as a new customer in me the last couple of years
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were exactly what I wanted. I will order from this seller again. I was very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Carhartt Men's 6 Work Soft Toe NWP Work Boot
product_meta.description: Carhartt developed Traditional Welt work boots to offer a wide variety of styles in classic designs that are incredibly durable, comfortable and affordable. Tough jobs call for tough boots. Goodyear welt construction with lug bottom Carhartt rubber outsoles provide superior traction and durability. A PU Cushion Comfort Insole and PU strobel cushion pad provide comfortable support and reduce foot fatigue. All styles incorporate FastDry Technology linings that wick away sweat for comfort.
